markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs=""
>
[Guided Skill](/Feats.aspx?ID=4108) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 83</row>

**Archetype** [Scions of Domora](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=202)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Scion of Domora Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4106)

</column>

---

You ask your spirit guide for aid. For the next 10 minutes, you gain a +2 status bonus to checks made using [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15), or [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16).
name: Guided Skill
